tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_performance_metrics (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR,
  kill_death_ratio FLOAT,
  accuracy FLOAT,
  win_loss_ratio FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
  match_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  kills INT,
  deaths INT,
  win INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(100),
    kill_death_ratio DECIMAL,
    accuracy DECIMAL,
    win_loss_ratio DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE match_history (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    player_id INT,
    winner BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_stats(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    weapon_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_stats(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (weapon_id) REFERENCES weapon_stats(weapon_id)
);
